category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MELoadAllLinkedStructures
preference.preference_description: Enables auto-loading of all the linked product structures and plant structures to a Bill of Process or Plant Bill of Process. Valid Values: true : it auto-loads all the linked product structures and plant structures to a Bill of Process or Plant Bill of Process. false: behavior will be based on preference "MSE_load_related_product_process_plant". Note: It would work, if the preference "MSE_load_related_product_process_plant" is set to "true"
